name: Home coming
description:
Try to get home before your ship's engines are too unstable to continue. Build your ship in the best way possible to get back home.

When you build your ship down or up don't go too far there is a known bug to glitch the building this way.

The game was made by me alone in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 49 game jam. Assets are from the polygonscificity_syntystudios_windows pack. Also used the bot model from https://maxparata.itch.io/voxel-mechas
